item.description:
Join us at the Common Market/Quincy on Thursday, June 9th at 6:30pm.  The Common Market is made up of many individual restaurants.  The restaurant will be attending is "Cafe De Paris".  You can check out the menu at the website.  The entrees are very affordable.  

The location of the restaurant is right off the highway. 

We hope you will join us at the Common Market/Quincy for dinner and enjoy the company.

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

Thursday 6/9/11 @ 6:30pm

Common Market/Quincy
97 Willard Street
Qunicy, MA  02169
(617) 773-9532
www.commonmarketrestaurants.com

Meeting Place:  You can ask for Jeanne at the Cafe De Paris restaurant

Please Note: If you are running very late or not attending please call the restaurant so they can let us know.

Organizers: Jeanne White

Event Fee: [Current] Annual Members - FREE, Members - $2 each, Guests - $2 each; Reminder, you are now able to join as a mid year member for half price of $6 for the remainder of the year!

Min/Max: No minimum.  Due to the size of the restaurant, the max is set at 10 people.

Guests: Are Invited to attend

RSVP Deadline: 6pm on Wednesday, June 8th. Any changes made after this time may not be seen by an Event Organizer prior to the event.

Please bring cash. You are responsible for your portion of the bill including drinks, food, shared food, tax, and tip.

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

Directions: To follow
item.how_to_find_us: Meet outside the front door or at our table after we are seated.
item.why: Sorry for the short notice on this event at the Common Market in Quincy - Sometime spontaneous creates an excellent time.

group.name: The South Shore Dining Out Meetup Group

item.name: Dinner at the Common Market/Quincy
